name: Astral Nona
description:
Elvira is a seventy year old nona (an argentinian elderly lady) with an affinity for healing witchcraft and astral projections... Unfortunately her powers are fading and so, you, the player, will have to guide her kitten, Tango, in making a potion that will help her wake up from an astral sleep.

In this point and click adventure, you will help Tango wake up his human, Elvira, by solving different puzzles and finding objects in the enviroment that will push you further to the goal of saving Elvira, the Astral Nona.

Global Game Jam 2021 Submission

Play Test Now!
